00060 #include "stdafx.h"

00069 // Construction/Destruction
00071 
00077 SBW_API SignatureListContents::SignatureListContents(SignatureType arg)
00078 {
00079         push_back(SignatureElement(arg));
00080 }
00081 
00087 SBW_API SignatureListContents::SignatureListContents(const char *&signature)
00088 {
00089         sbwSignature::consumeSpace(signature);
00090 
00091         while (*signature != '\0' && *signature != '}' && *signature != ')')
00092         {
00093                 push_back(SignatureElement(signature));
00094 
00095                 sbwSignature::compareString(",", signature); // don't care if its not there
00096                 sbwSignature::consumeSpace(signature);
00097         }
00098 }
00099 
00108 SBW_API void SignatureListContents::write(DataBlockWriter writer, va_list &ap) const
00109 {
00110         std::vector<SignatureElement>::const_iterator itr = begin();
00111 
00112         while (itr != end())
00113         {
00114                 SignatureType type ;
00115 
00116                 (*itr).getType(type);
00117                 type.getImpl()->write(writer, ap);
00118                 itr++;
00119         }
00120 
00121 }
00122 
00138 SBW_API void SignatureListContents::read(DataBlockReader reader, va_list &ap) const
00139 {
00140         std::vector<SignatureElement>::const_iterator itr = begin();
00141 
00142         while (itr != end())
00143         {
00144                 SignatureType type ;
00145 
00146                 (*itr).getType(type);
00147                 type.getImpl()->read(reader, ap);
00148                 itr++;
00149         }
00150 
00151 }

00158 SBW_API std::vector<SignatureElement> *SignatureListContents::copyVector() const
00159 {
00160         std::vector<SignatureElement> *result = new std::vector<SignatureElement>(size());
00161 
00162         result->assign(begin(), end());
00163 
00164         return result ;
00165 }

00172 SBW_API bool SignatureListContents::match(const SignatureListContents &other) const
00173 {
00174         std::vector<SignatureElement>::const_iterator itr = begin();
00175         std::vector<SignatureElement>::const_iterator otherItr = other.begin();
00176 
00177         while (itr != end())
00178         {
00179                 if (otherItr == other.end())
00180                         return false ;
00181 
00182                 SignatureType type, otherType ;
00183 
00184                 (*otherItr).getType(otherType);
00185                 (*itr).getType(type);
00186 
00187                 if (!type.match(otherType))
00188                         return false ;
00189 
00190                 itr++;
00191                 otherItr++;
00192         }
00193 
00194         return otherItr == other.end();
00195 }
